items/other/blacksmithing/watering_can_c: A copper watering can. Can be charged to water 3 tiles in a row.
items/other/blacksmithing/watering_can_g: A splendid golden watering can. Can be charged to water a 6x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/watering_can_i: An iron watering can. Can be charged to water a 3x3 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/watering_can_m: A watering can made from mistril. Can be charged to water a 6x9 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/watering_can_s: A silver watering can. Can be charged to water a 3x6 area.
items/other/blacksmithing/watering_can_w: A worn but still serviceable watering can. Used to water plants.
